mean_en: feeling relaxed and happy because something difficult or unpleasant has been stopped, avoided, or made easier :feeling relief
word_etyma: reliev宽慰+ed形容词后缀→relieved放心的
short_phrase: be relieved that work is over
sentence: I felt relieved after completing the month-long project.
sentence_trans: 当做完这个耗时一个月的项目以后，我感到一下轻松了。
